Tecmo needs your help for Monster Rancher 3... again!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2001 Topics (Year Of The Heart Crystal): Tecmo needs your help for Monster Rancher 3... again!
By Eggo on Thursday, May 24, 2001 - 05:26 pm:

Please go here and post your suggestions for what we did right and wrong with Monster Rancher 2. This is for our developers to study, as they prepare the U.S. version of Monster Rancher 3.

http://www.tecmoinc.com/ubb/Forum18/HTML/000014.html

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, May 26, 2001 - 10:30 am:

I'd like to encourage everyone to participate in this discussion! Eggo is going to be having a meeting with the programmers, and needs our help to make this game great! I know that most of you have not actually played MF3, but many of you have followed my posts while I played.

Not many game companies have such an open-door policy for fans, I'd like to see us take advantage of this opportunity!

By Lisa Shock on Sunday, May 27, 2001 - 10:52 am:

Thanks to those who took the time to reply in the thread!

-But I also know that there are lots of opinionated ranchers out there who haven't spoken up yet. C'mon everyone: This is your chance to participate in the creation of a Monster Rancher game!

By torey_luvullo on Monday, May 28, 2001 - 06:42 pm:

i think there is still time for people to be heard in this thread before the tecmo folks come back from their holiday weekend...let our voices be heard!

By torey_luvullo on Thursday, May 31, 2001 - 04:24 am:

eggo closed both threads last night. thanx to everyone who participated.
